categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic organizations

nodes.text: Operation Fracture Oversight was a group of Rebel Alliance generals and admirals who were in charge of overseeing Operation Fracture.

In 0 BBY, Operation Fracture Oversight was formed to oversee Operation Fracture, a Rebel Alliance operation to extract Imperial scientist Galen Walton Erso so that he could testify to the Imperial Senate. Alliance Generals Ria and Davits Draven, Admiral Raddus, along with Chancellor Mon Mothma were all members.
Operation Fracture Oversight made its first appearance in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story novelization.
